Title: Insights Analyst, Wild Rift (Contract)
RoleDescription:
As Analysts at Riot, we build analyses that help Rioters to make difficult decisions. We are part of an interdisciplinary team that works with Rioters from other disciplines (i.e. - designers, artists, engineers, producers) to conduct studies and analyses that will inform the features, systems, and experiences of our products.
The Insights discipline helps Rioters make strategic data-informed decisions. We're an interdisciplinary group of scientists, economists, consultants, and strategists from all sorts of backgrounds who join together to represent and advocate for players around the world. We believe that illuminating the globally diverse experiences, behaviors, and needs of players is essential to Riot living up to our player-focused mission. We're a group united by our love of games, science, and helping others succeed.
As an Insights Analyst (Contract) on the Wild Rift team, you will collaborate directly with Wild Rift game leadership to illuminate key business decisions through rigorous data analysis and strategic insights. Your technical expertise and analytical rigor will play an instrumental role in advancing Wild Rifts publishing initiatives across brand marketing, performance marketing, channel optimization, and player acquisition strategies. As a crucial contributor, you'll also execute regular tracking based on standardized measurement methodologies, and deliver insightful reporting that empowers strategic action.Please note that Riot Games does not offer relocation packages for this position.
That's where you come in.
Responsibilities:

Maintain and update Wild Rift's global and regional tracking/reporting related to defined awareness and interest metrics.
Extract and analyze data from databases to conduct correlation analysis between upper-funnel metrics and downstream conversions (install, trial, revival)
Drive advanced analyses such as performance marketing attributions through navigating databases, extracting data, creating dashboards, and resolving data issues along the way.
Support and execute standard/recurring reporting for performance tracking/measurement
Translate user segments based on business needs into SQL queries to retrieve cohort data from databases.
Identify and map the source of truth data sets and generate executable retargeting campaign cohorts for targeted outreach.

Required Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Business Analytics, Marketing, Economics, or related fields.
3-5 years of experience in data analysis or business intelligence roles.
Proficiency in SQL with foundational Python/R knowledge for data analysis.
High familiarity with Tableau or equivalent data visualization tools.
Excellent analytical skills with the capability to interpret and clearly communicate data insights.
Strong communication and collaboration skills, able to effectively engage with cross-functional teams.

Desired Qualifications:

Experience working with Databricks or similar cloud-based data platforms.
Familiarity with social listening platforms such as Talkwalker.
Prior experience in publishing analytics within gaming or entertainment sectors.
2+ years marketing practices including User Acquisition (UA), Paid Media, and Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
Business fluent in Mandarin Chinese and English

Partners with filmmakers to drive and execute the creative vision of Film/TV titles from inception to delivery

Maintaining solid relationships within studio and with external filmmaking community
Promoting a culture of creative collaboration and facilitating peer feedback throughout the filmmaking process
Championing diversity and inclusion in all areas of the development process & department
Supporting the strategic priorities of the studio leadership team, particularly in the pursuit of excellence, mentorship, diversity & inclusion, and studio engagement

Educate them on the lifecycle of a project
Help problem-solve when they are facing challenges on moving projects forward

Responsible for writer, director and showrunner talent sourcing & matching.

Collaborate on story development of various ancillary projects, such as short-form content, and various content exploration programs within the studio.
Become a trusted thought-partner to filmmakers and support the projects creatively throughout their lifespan, by reviewing visual development materials, storyboards, reels at various stages of development and production.
Effectively lead creative development rooms, and ensure understanding across all participants, which will require the ability to speak the same language as writers and directors.

Title: Principal Technical Product Manager, Game Understanding Agents - Game Tech Group
RoleDescription:
Technical Product Managers combine deep technical knowledge and experience with product leadership capabilities to enable Riot Games to deliver key products and supporting systems to players. You will develop and execute product strategies on Riot's products and technologies while leading diverse teams to deliver creative solutions to our most difficult technical challenges.
The ML Bots team builds Game Understanding Agents that power in-game player experiences across Riots live titles and games in development. These agents use machine learning to play, understand, and adapt like real players, enabling new forms of gameplay, training, and player support. As the Principal Technical Product Manager for ML Bots, you will set the vision, strategy, and roadmap for the technical capabilities that make these agents possible. You will partner closely with engineers, data scientists, designers, and game teams to ensure our modeling, simulation, and serving platforms meet the needs of multiple games, products, and regions worldwide. You will be accountable for delivering player-impacting features and robust internal systems that accelerate AI adoption and performance in live environments, with a particular focus on translational research and building effective research-to-production pipelines You and your team will provide engaging, high-quality experiences built from Game Understanding Agents across Riots games. Youll provide a product vision for shared capabilities that reduce duplication and speed up delivery. Youll partner with technical leaders to build AI products that support modeling, evaluation, and inference requirements while meeting high standards of reliability, latency, and scalability across regions. Youll own the roadmaps that deliver robust tools and strong integration support to partner teams so that they can iterate rapidly, and youll keep the product direction focused on quality and sustainability through ongoing feedback from both players and developers.
Responsibilities:

Define and own the vision, strategy, and roadmap for ML Bot technology, ensuring it delivers compelling player experiences and reusable capabilities across games and products.
Partner with technical leads to establish requirements for modeling, simulation, evaluation, and serving systems that support Game Understanding Agents in production.
Prioritize initiatives based on player value, developer impact, and feasibility, balancing short-term delivery with long-term scalability.
